TopicTitle: Keragon - stock DragonRider replica test flight

Articles.Content:
Launched aboard a modified Kerbtron-12 rocket, the Keragon succesfully rendevzoused with the Kerbal Space Station in LKO after a single Orbit, and docked during its second orbit after flying half way around the Station. During reentry, the Docking port shields were left open to test their ability to resist the stress of re-entry without endangering the Craft. Unfortunately, the Fuel ran out mere meters above the Surface of Kerbin, causing the lander to hit the ground hard and falling appart. However, nobody was injured and the command pod itself remained intact.
